website_summaries.verdict: This Under Armour running shoe has made a lot of users happy and satisfied. The features and materials used in the making of the shoe promotes a comfortable ride. The Under Armour Charged Bandit Trail GTX is sure to offer runners with a durable, lightweight, and durable shoe that aims to take their running experience to the next level. With ease and confidence, runners will start and finish the activities in a timely manner.
pros: A significant number of testers said that the Under Armour Charged Bandit Trail GTX is lightweight
A lot of users commented that the shoe is comfortable
According to those who have tested the running footwear, it has excellent arch support
Based on some reviews, the running shoe has a perfect fit
The shoe is best used for hiking and running activities, as observed by several buyers
Its roomy toe box is admired by many consumers
The majority of the purchasers said that the shoe is durable
cons: A number of wearers claimed the waterproofing feature is not effective
The running shoe is expensive, noted by some users
A few testers wished for more masculine color combinations

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a lightweight, waterproof trail runner and sideline shoe for coaching. The fit is good; solid arch support and a roomy toebox for thicker winter socks. The waterproof Goretex is excellent without being too heavy. All in all, I love that it’s leightweight in spite of its waterproofing. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth P.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers ARE NOT waterproof as advertised. I use them for work and within the first 10 minutes of walking in the grass my feet are soaked from the morning dew.
customer_reviews.author: Anorma Stitz

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Feel.  Not Even Sure If It's Legit UA Shoes
customer_reviews.text: 1. Shoes came in generic brown box that said items were repackaged due to original box damage. 2. No paperwork or tags with shoes. 3. Felt cheap and unlike any other UA shoes I've had before. 4. Shoes felt uneven, like both feet were tilted outward. 5. Paid $89 for them, and when I went to return they were listed as $59. 6. Unsure if they are even legit UA product. I printed return label about ten mins after opening package. Extremely disappointed in product. Having a hard time believing these are actual UA. I've had numerous UA shoes in the past. These felt like dollar store shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Sedona. I wear either 11.5 or 12, got these in 12 and fit perfect. Didn’t break them in before the trip. We hiked about 25 miles in 3 days and not one blister. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: otisraccoon

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are coral/pink not the reddish orange the pics show
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this shoe is that the pictures make it appear that the tread and highlights are a reddish orange when in reality they are a coral pink. I thought maybe the color was off on my tablet but I checked the listing on 3 additional devices and they all make the shoes look some shade of Orange or red. This is not a masculine color at all. Most likely returning these shoes despite the fit and comfort being top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: WartoothGlass

customer_reviews.title: Not actually waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These are not really waterproof. Your feet will be wet after hiking in the spring or running on damp grass. Size fits as expected and are nice running shoes when dry but beware of the shoe not actually being waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Dewcough

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes! My son wore them on our most recent hiking trip in the rain. He was the only one with dry feet when we got to camp. He had no complaints about these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: c.bear

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY SHOES
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Under Armour shoes that I’ve bought. The first pair (a different type) I had to buy bigger and they kept getting my feet wet. These ones are much thicker and true to size. I haven’t tried them in water yet but based on the material, I’m assuming my feet would still get partially wet but not AS wet as my previous pair/type. Overall very comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Quietstorm80

customer_reviews.title: Tuff shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great but they appear to be hot pink in person. Tread is tuff, pictures are from approximately 900,000 step walked. About two weeks of moving furniture ups stairs and in/out ramps, trucks, docks. Great shoe for working or trails.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes !.... fit was perfect!, very comfortable’ just finished a all day hike ! feet feel great !...
customer_reviews.author: Dale ball

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes as an ER nurse. They are more comfortable than I anticipated and the Goretex make wiping them off quite easy. I am posting this as I prepare to buy my second pair to have ready for work when my first pair needs to be retired 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband kept getting his feet wet at work and it drove him crazy so he found these on amazon and they have not disappointed at all!!!! He says they are completely waterproof and comfortable! Great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: StacBow

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got this pair of shoe because it advertised that it is waterproof, and to my surprise it actually is. I work 2 days a week in the early mornings on a golf course. The dew is in full effect, but with these shoes I no longer have to worry about wet sock at the end of my day. Secondly, I hike 2 to 3 days a week on trails and I use these shoes for that. I just did a 12 mile hike in them and had no issues, no foot pain, sweating, or any blisters. This is a great shoe, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Astrodude

customer_reviews.title: Best trail shoe I own!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a couple of months back. Used them for hiking and mountain biking. Such a comfortable and capable shoe. Tread really holds well on rocks and loose dirt. Put them to work up in Lake Tahoe while hiking some trails and fishing the lakes and streams. Totally waterproof and sturdy. Would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: marc belluomini

customer_reviews.title: Made in China :(
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shoe but for some reason I assumed it wasn't a Chinese made product before purchasing. Im trying to avoid directly funding the Chinese communist party.
customer_reviews.author: KNOW IT ALL

customer_reviews.title: Hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This hiking shoe was worth the money. Very lite and comfortable. Went on a easy hike and it was great. Hiked 8 miles with no shoe discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: thorwonder

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Nike Monarch shoe person for years. I switched to these under armour shoes with no regrets
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance between a running shoe and a hiking boot.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more sturdy than a running shoe. Much more supportive while still being very comfortable. Fits as expected. It’s a little hot because it’s gortex but feet stay dry even in wet grass
customer_reviews.author: Darren D

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it its so good and nice to wear. Quality and size is also good thank you seller
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and awesome I use them at my work Cause I clean car and trucks How long can they can dry
customer_reviews.author: Adam Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long runs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes for flat feet people. Good grip underneath and sturdy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are everything as advertised and more. I caddy on a golf course and they are perfect for wet rounds. Not a drop gets to my feet. They are also very light and quite comfortable. I recommend them to any one looking for an outdoor walking, running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Argyle

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: I work in HVAC I don’t need a steel toe I just wanted something waterproof and durable and comfortable these shoe are a perfect Replacement for your anti-American Nikes
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been good. I test it eashing the car and my socks on the inside did nlt get wet. I jog in it a few time 5 miles each and it doesn't hurt my ankles. It's comfortable to wear. Iove it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great shor
customer_reviews.text: I saw people say they ran small so I ordered up. Mistake I returned and got normal size and they fit perfectly. Great shoe order true size. Exchange was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers fit perfectly. I'll have to try them out to see how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as in picture
customer_reviews.text: The what we thought was going to be a red color is a pink.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin & Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and built to last
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I have ever owned. I like hiking and getting back on trails and this shoe allows My feet to stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: sonny baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for my son who picked them out himself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe unfortunately i feel they run small. I wear a 10.5 and should have got an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Different color
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves are really nice. The problem I had is that they are more pink than the description and picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sel

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair that I have purchased. I stay here n my feet all day and work 12 hour days in all weather elements. The shoe is definitely very comfortable and water proof as advertised. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few weeks ago and so far, so good! They're very comfortable and no durability issues as of yet. I do a fair bit of trail and beach running and they're treated me well!
customer_reviews.author: Rogan Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Husband didn’t try them on until too late to send back. But way smaller then the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but order a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel like a size too small. Otherwise they look like a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had the shoes for less than a month. Falling apart already. Very unsatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Treads wore out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: My husband found these shoes very comfortable and they have good support for walking and jogging BUT in less than 2 month of daily use the treads are already wearing down. I would expect more durability from Under Armor.
customer_reviews.author: DJC147

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sneaks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for hiking and biking! Fit well, are comfortable and seem very durable. Graphics are great, get a lot of compliments on the look. Are water resistant and give good surface contact on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: spyderp45

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes BUT BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: In the picture they look orange but when you get them they are of a more hot pink/orange. Ordered for my boyfriend but I’ll keep them for myself I guess! 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Julia Teasley

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: Got these for early wet morning trail walk/run with my dog. Comfortable enough for trail runs. Easy fit. Keeps my feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: A little small but WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these at Cabela’s. They exceed my expectations! I have a history of shin splints and haven’t run in over 3 years due to back-to-back pregnancies. Just took them for their pilot run in 36 degree, rainy weather. My feet are dry! I went 1.2 miles without stopping, which was better than I expected. I do a mix of trail and sidewalk and they were great on both. The only thing I warm about is sizing! I usually wear a 9.5-10 in women’s, but the 10 was way too small. I ended up having to buy the men’s in size 10. Otherwise, these are worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Moore

customer_reviews.title: water proof
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes esp to walk on the wet grass and uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: SUBBIA JAGANNATHAN

customer_reviews.title: Good show
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, lightweight, Waterproof with gortex. I had to order 1/2 size bigger, they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: A Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other Under Amour shoes I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering if these are counterfeit. Half size too small, and feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Androo

customer_reviews.title: But this
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made. Fits properly and keeps my feet dry. Recommend to anyone who works in delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all-in-all good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, you should totally make this shoes with ankle supports though
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

product_meta.title: Under Armour - Mens Charged Bandit GTX Trail Shoes
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
GORE-TEX construction is 100% waterproof but remains incredibly breathable
TPU film for added support & durability where you need it
Molded Comfort Collar locks in the heel with a soft, plush feel for zero distractions
High rebound EVA sockliner for a comfortable & responsive ride
